opis: Prodajem kuću u Trogiru, na otoku Čiovu, Saldun. Kuća je položajno orjentirana jugozapadno, te ima pogled na zaljev Saldun, južni dio otoka Čiova, Otok Šoltu i srednjo Dalmatinske otoke. Kuća je udaljena od centra Trogira 1,2 km. Kuća je građena za tri apartmana u prizemlju po 40-tak m2 ili dva stana po 65 m2, tri apartmana na prvom katu po 40-tak m2 ili dva stana po 65 m2, jedan suterenski stan/apartman od 50-tak m2, jedan potkrovni stan/apartman od 70-ak m2, koji je uređen za stanovanje, ostatak kuće je u roh-bau stanju, objekt ima sustav garaža u sklopu kojeg se može parkirati od 9 do 13 osobnih automobila. Kuća ima i tri rezervara za vodu s ukupnim kapacitetom 60 m3 za prikupljanje kišnice i sl. Ukupna bruto razvijena površina objekta je 670 m2. Veličina parcele je 435 m2. Kuća ima priključke struje, vode i kanalizacije. Objekt je legaliziran, uplanjen i kao takav zaveden u zemljišne knjige. Oko kuće se nalaze stabla limuna, naranače, smokve, loze... Nekretnina ima čisto vlasništvo 1/1, bez tereta. Nekretnina se prodaje po navedenoj cijeni, koja ne može biti manja, u slučaju izostanka interesa za kupnju nekretnina će biti povučena iz prodaje. Agencije isključenje THIS IS GOOGLE TRANSLATION I am selling a house in Trogir, on the island of Čiovo, Saldun. The house is oriented southwest, and has a view of the Saldun bay, the southern part of the island of Čiovo, the island of Šolta and the central Dalmatian islands. The house is 1.2 km from the center of Trogir. The house was built for three apartments on the ground floor of about 40 m2 each or two apartments of 65 m2, three apartments on the first floor of about 40 m2 or two apartments of 65 m2, one basement apartment/apartment of about 50 m2, one attic apartment/apartment of about 70 m2, which is furnished for living, the rest of the house is in a unfinished state, the building has a garage system within which 9 to 13 cars can be parked. The house also has three water tanks with a total capacity of 60 m3 for collecting rainwater, etc. The total gross developed area of ​​the building is 670 m2. The plot size is 435 m2. The house has electricity, water and sewage connections. The property is legalized, planned and as such registered in the land registry. Around the house there are lemon trees, orange trees, fig trees, vines... The property has pure ownership 1/1, without encumbrances. The property is for sale at the stated price, which cannot be lower, in case of lack of interest in purchasing the property it will be withdrawn from sale. Agency exclusion
Grijanje: Sustav grijanja: Grijalice i radijatori na struju
